name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 21, a netizen posted a video saying that he was harassed by customs when he was leaving an Egyptian airport. People from other countries passed through customs very smoothly, but he had to wait for 50 minutes.
Netizens responded: "Because you have a strong motherland behind you" and "It's not like this in Wolf Warriors"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 16, owners of Fengjingyuan in Bazhou City, Langfang, Hebei Province gathered to protest against the unfinished property development. During the protest, a conflict broke out between the owners and workers, and one owner was injured.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 16, Xiangyang, Hubei. Merchants at Hancheng Dahanmao Shopping Center protested against non-refund of rent.
October 15, Zhengzhou, Henan. Owners of Sunac Yuhu Chenyuan protested against the delay in reducing the standard of the property and demanded the delivery of the property.
October 16, Nanning, Guangxi. Owners of Xingjinjunfu protested against the developer's breach of contract and non-delivery of the property.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 16, in Xi'an, Shaanxi, the owners of Rongcheng Langyue Community protested against the developer for not providing central heating as agreed in the contract and for building a boiler in the basement of the kindergarten without authorization. It is reported that this is the second time the developer has tried to install a boiler. Last year, the owner stopped it once, and this year they directly invited security personnel to force the construction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 17, the owners of Languang Yongjin Tianfu in Hannan District, Wuhan, Hubei, protested against the unfinished project.
On October 17, the owners of Nanhuan Aolin Shuimu Huafu Community in Shen County, Liaocheng, Shandong, protested against the heating problem.
Recently, in Yinhe Community, Luoyang, Henan, the owners removed the basement gate rods on their own because the heating was not provided for three years after the delivery of the house, claiming that they would use the basement for free until the heating problem was solved.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 18, Zhoukou, Henan. Homeowners of Jianye Jiangshanhui Community in Xiangcheng protested against the occupation of public areas.
October 16, Fangchenggang, Guangxi. Homeowners of Guancanghai Community protested against the unfinished project.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 11, Chengdu, Sichuan. Guanghui Shen Ke Rong Nissan 4S store employees held up banners to protest against their sudden dismissal. The banners read, "We made Guanghui a Fortune 500 company, but Guanghui laid us off early." "Chengdu Guanghui Group and Zhugui Group's black-hearted enterprise (Shen Ke Rong store) used illegal and despicable means to force employees to be laid off. Please resolve the labor contract in accordance with the law!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 21, Zion Church issued another prayer letter. It pointed out that since 2024, the Chinese government's control and suppression of Chinese house churches has become increasingly severe.
On October 20, the police and multiple departments in Chaoyang District, Daxing District, and Shijingshan District of Beijing raided multiple gathering places at the same time, interrupted the ongoing Sunday worship, and forcibly took away many church members.
Elder Qin Guoliang was administratively detained for 14 days in the name of "illegally organizing gatherings."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 22, Putin and Xi Jinping had a cordial meeting at the BRICS Summit held in Kazan, Russia.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/rxCeyBJ578

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 22, Bloomberg reported that Canadian research company TechInsights discovered through disassembly that Huawei’s latest AI chip Ascend 910B is produced by TSMC.
TSMC subsequently stated that it would no longer supply Huawei from mid-September 2020. Huawei also stated that Huawei does not produce any chips through TSMC.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 22, dancer Jin Xing was rejected by the Guangzhou Culture and Tourism Bureau for her performance application of the stage play "Sunrise", so she called out to the director of the approval department of the Culture and Tourism Bureau on Weibo to express her strong dissatisfaction.
In January this year, after Jin Xing finished her performance in Taiyuan, Shanxi, she took the rainbow flag from the audience and displayed it on the stage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a video of Chinese tourists shooting birds with slingshots in a Thai scenic spot has sparked heated discussions. The video has been reposted by many Thai media. Many Thai netizens complained about Chinese tourists in the comment section: "Some Chinese tourists should not be allowed to enter the country. They bring their own country's customs here, which is really disgusting."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported online that CCTV's "Geography China" program has invited a guest from the Institute of Literature and History to participate in the recording of the program. In order to ensure the safe broadcast of the program, the guest is required to pass the political review.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Kim Yo-jong delivered a speech on the 22nd, calling South Korea and Ukraine "mentally ill people" and saying that South Korea and Ukraine were ungrateful dogs trained by the United States.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Russia, a man posted a video saying that his wallet was stolen while he was traveling in Russia. He asked the embassy for help, but the embassy refused to help. The man said with dismay that China provides hundreds of billions of yuan in aid to Africa every year, but its own people get no help when they encounter difficulties. "I used to be very patriotic, but how can we be patriotic now?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 22, the Taiwan Public Opinion Foundation released its latest poll. Regarding Lai Ching-te's statement that "the People's Republic of China has no right to represent Taiwan", 70.8% of the people agreed and 20.1% disagreed. 
"Taiwan and the mainland belong to the same Republic of China, and cross-strait reunification is the country's future goal", which is the spirit of "one country, two regions", the results show that 60.1% of the people do not support it, 25.9% support it, 10.2% have no opinion, and 3.8% do not know or refuse to answer.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, many Shanghai netizens have said that they have received calls from the police, asking them whether they plan to participate in this year's Shanghai Halloween. They were also reminded not to engage in politically sensitive COSPLAY.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 22, Henan Province, a man used the Italian fascists’ ban on workers’ strikes to mock China: “No wonder the fascists perished, because they betrayed the workers and peasants. We are different. In our country, workers and peasants are the most respected. To use the words of my favorite teacher Zhang Weiwei: I think this is a kind of self-confidence.” The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 22, Shanghai. A blogger posted a video asking: What political affiliation are you? Some netizens chose the last two (traitor, counter-revolutionary) in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 22, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. The woman said that her tobacco and alcohol shop was robbed in May this year, and several minors stole more than 200,000 yuan worth of alcohol in the store. As a result, because the other party was a minor, the most serious youth was only detained for 14 days. The 200,000 yuan she lost has not been recovered yet. She posted on Xiaohongshu and received a call from the police within 20 minutes asking her to delete the post.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 22, in Weifang, Shandong, a group of people paraded a Tesla on a bullock cart, with words such as "Mougua fraud" and "fraud of consumers" written on the body of the car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 20, villagers from a betel nut farm in Hainan protested against the government's forced land acquisition. The villagers questioned: "You know it's illegal, why do you still break the law?" The law enforcement officers on the scene shouted at the person who took the video: "You can't solve the problem even if you take the video." Then a group of law enforcement officers surrounded the person who took the video and pushed him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 23, Hanzhong, Shaanxi. Workers at Hanjiang Steel Plant protested against the factory's failure to pay their social security for ten years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 23, Shijiazhuang, Hebei. Owners of the unfinished building of Evergrande Central Plaza collectively requested to see the mayor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Three-color cloth movement"
Recently, rights defenders across the country have begun to use "three-color rain cloth" as a symbol of rights protection
On October 13, Maybach owners in Suzhou, Jiangsu, covered their roofs with three-color cloth to protest against vehicle leaks. This behavior began to attract imitation.
On October 15, the owners of Longdu in Lishui, Zhejiang, covered the roofs with three-color cloth to protest against house leaks
On October 20, the owners of Huayu Lanyuan in Suzhou, Jiangsu collectively pulled three-color cloths to protest against housing quality issues.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 22 (Released), a man said that he came to Russia to serve as a soldier for the country, for the people, for the children, to stop NATO's eastward expansion, and to fight against the United States and aid Russia.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 19, in Pingxiang, Jiangxi, villagers from Yangjian Village, Lianhua County, held a sit-in protest against Kemei Paper’s entry into the village and pollution. During the protest, they had a scuffle with the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens contributed a homemade video to commemorate the first anniversary of the death of former Prime Minister Li Keqiang

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 22, BBC Japanese published a commentary asking, "Was the attack on the Japanese boy in Shenzhen caused by online nationalism?" The accompanying picture of the article showed a Red Guard holding a keyboard in front of Tiananmen Square.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 23, Xinxiang, Henan. The Xinxiang Hongqi District Rock Culture Association was formally established.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 23, near Renmin Road in Qingdao, a cement tanker took revenge on society by driving in the opposite direction and ramming dozens of vehicles. The driver shouted angrily in the cab, "Damn it, the Communist Party won't let me live, I'm going to kill people."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On-site pictures

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A bus was hit and completely destroyed.
The casualties are currently unknown, and Chinese social platforms are urgently deleting these videos.
